textBeforeTable: Don Slack’s 2013 Top Ten Albums Phosphorescent, 04/09/2013 // photo credit: Victoria Holt For the rest of the year, we’ll be spotlighting our KEXP DJs Top Albums of 2013, leading up to our 2013 90.3 Top Album Countdown! Vote today for your favorite albums of the year, and you’ll be entered into a drawing to win a 10 CD pack of the Top Albums of 2013, as voted on by KEXP listeners. Voting ends on Friday, December 13th, so let us know your favorites now, and tune in on Thursday, December 19th to hear if your picks made the list! textAfterTable: Don Slack is the host of Swingin’ Doors, airing Thursday nights, 6-9PM.
